hero.title: A for ever sane inbox within a week
hero.text: Free Your Inbox safely learns to know you and your habits to smartly predict which emails you want to receive.

first.title: Unclutter your inbox effortless
first.text: Free Your Inbox smartly and automatically filter out emails. You can modify our filtering in a single click. The more you train us the better we become. You get a saner inbox in just few clicks.

second.title: Spend less time on emails
second.text: Free Your inbox makes sure you spend less and less time on your emails. You are now on only interrupted by emails that deserve to be read, answered or kept. You focus on what matter.

third.title: Keep your habits
third.text: You donâ€™t have to install anything nor use a new email app. We are seamlessly integrated to your favourite environment. You keep on doing things the way you like.
